A Shrek-style Christmas, as funny as it gets! The Christmas tree 
isn&#039;t the only thing green in this new holiday classic. Shrek 
is back and trying to get into the spirit of the season. After 
promising Fiona and the kids a Christmas they&#039;ll remember, he is 
forced to take a crash course in the holiday. But just when he 
thinks he has everything for their quiet family Christmas just 
right, Donkey, Puss in Boots, Gingy and the rest of the gang 
decide to crash the party. Shrek the Halls is the greatest 
holiday tale that&#039;s never been told.. until now.
